    • CardEffect10

      public CardEffect10(int[] fromEntrance, int[] fromDiningRoom, Player player, GeneralCoinSupply generalCoinSupply, ProfessorsManager professorsManager, Player[] professors, List<Player> players)
      Parameters:
      fromEntrance - students to take from entrance.
      fromDiningRoom - students to take from dining room.
      player - the player who played the character card.
      generalCoinSupply - the coin supply of the game.
      professorsManager - to calculate influence.
      professors - owned by players.
      players - in game.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute() throws IllegalClientInputException, EmptyGeneralCoinSupplyException
      This method swaps a maximum of three students from the dining room to the entrance.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface CardEffect
      Throws:
      IllegalClientInputException
      EmptyGeneralCoinSupplyException

    • removeStudents

      private void removeStudents(int[] source, int[] studentsToRemove) throws IllegalClientInputException
      This method remove the selected students (in studentToRemove array) from the source array (entrance or dining room).
      Parameters:
      source - entrance or dining room.
      studentsToRemove - students to remove.
      Throws:
      IllegalClientInputException - if the number of students to remove from source is incorrect.

    • removeOrThrowException

      private void removeOrThrowException(int[] source, int[] studentsToRemove, int i, int j) throws IllegalClientInputException
      This method removes students from source if present, otherwise it throws an exception.
      Parameters:
      source - entrance or dining room.
      studentsToRemove - students to remove.
      i - source color.
      j - color to remove.
      Throws:
      IllegalClientInputException - if students to remove are more than available ones.

    • addStudentsInto

      private void addStudentsInto(int[] destination, int[] studentsToAdd)
      This method adds the students taken from the studentsToAdd array into the destination array (entrance or dining room)
      Parameters:
      destination - entrance or dining room.
      studentsToAdd - students to add into the destination.

    • checkPositionForWallet

      private void checkPositionForWallet() throws EmptyGeneralCoinSupplyException
      Checks if the player moved some students in positions that allow him to receive an additional coin.
      Throws:
      EmptyGeneralCoinSupplyException - if the general coin supply is empty and so, the player will not receive an additional coin.

      private void checkForProfessors()
